descriptions.description: Regular polygonal systems...157-171 ℱ-WORM colorings of some 2-trees: partition vectors...173-182 On the k-metric dimension of metric spaces...25-38 On the size of maximally non-hamiltonian digraphs...59-66 Transversals in generalized Latin squares...39-47 Weight choosability of oriented hypergraphs...111-117 Pentavalent symmetric graphs of order four times an odd square-free integer...81-95 The pairing strategies of the 9-in-a-row game...97-109 Relating the total domination number and the annihilation number of cactus graphs and block graphs...183-202 The validity of Tutte's 3-flow conjecture for some Cayley graphs...203-213 Edge-transitive bi-p-metacirculants of valency p...215-235 The conductivity of superimposed key-graphs with a common one-dimensional adjacency nullspace...141-155 Splittable and unsplittable graphs and configurations...1-17 A note on the 4-girth-thickness of Kn,n,n...19-24 The Doyen-Wilson theorem for 3-sun systems...119-139 On chromatic indices of finite affine spaces...67-79 On the parameters of intertwining codes...49-58 On the domination number and the total domination number of Fibonacci cubes...245-255 Pappus's Theorem in Grassmannian Gr(3, ℂn)...257-276 Comparing the expected number of random elements from the symmetric and the alternating groups needed to generate a transitive subgroup...237-244 Plan S – A Golden Addition to the Diamond Open Access Publishing Model 9th PhD Summer School in Discrete Mathematics 9th Slovenian International Conference on Graph Theory (Bled '19) The 31st International Conference on Formal Power Series and Algebraic Combinatorics (FPSAC 2019) Maps ∩ Configurations ∩ Polytopes ∩ Molecules ⊆ Graphs: The mathematics of Tomaž Pisanski on the occasion of his 70th birthday
